human.name: Human
human.description: Detailed reference entry for Human in the races dataset.
human.data.racialTraits.0.name: Bonus Feat
human.data.racialTraits.0.description: Humans select one extra feat at 1st level.
human.data.racialTraits.1.name: Extra Skill Points
human.data.racialTraits.1.description: Humans gain 4 extra skill points at 1st level and 1 extra point at each additional level.

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.description: Detailed reference entry for Dwarf in the races dataset.
dwarf.data.racialTraits.0.name: Stonecunning
dwarf.data.racialTraits.0.description: +2 bonus on Search checks to notice unusual stonework and automatic checks when within 10 feet.
dwarf.data.racialTraits.1.name: Stability
dwarf.data.racialTraits.1.description: +4 bonus on ability checks made to resist being bull rushed or tripped when standing on the ground.
dwarf.data.racialTraits.2.name: Weapon Familiarity
dwarf.data.racialTraits.2.description: Dwarven waraxe and dwarven urgrosh are treated as martial weapons.
dwarf.data.skillBonuses.0.when: related to stone or metal items

elf.name: Elf
elf.description: Detailed reference entry for Elf in the races dataset.
elf.data.racialTraits.0.name: Immunity to Magic Sleep
elf.data.racialTraits.0.description: Elves are immune to magic sleep effects.
elf.data.racialTraits.1.name: Keen Senses
elf.data.racialTraits.1.description: An elf passing within 5 feet of a secret or concealed door is entitled to a Search check as if actively looking.
elf.data.racialTraits.2.name: Weapon Proficiency
elf.data.racialTraits.2.description: Proficient with longsword, rapier, longbow, and shortbow (including composite variants).

gnome.name: Gnome
gnome.description: Detailed reference entry for Gnome in the races dataset.
gnome.data.racialTraits.0.name: Defensive Training
gnome.data.racialTraits.0.description: +4 dodge bonus to AC against giants.
gnome.data.racialTraits.1.name: Weapon Familiarity
gnome.data.racialTraits.1.description: Gnome hooked hammer is treated as a martial weapon.

half-elf.name: Half-Elf
half-elf.description: Detailed reference entry for Half-Elf in the races dataset.
half-elf.data.racialTraits.0.name: Elf Blood
half-elf.data.racialTraits.0.description: Half-elves count as both elves and humans for effects related to race.
half-elf.data.racialTraits.1.name: Immunity to Sleep

half-orc.name: Half-Orc
half-orc.description: Detailed reference entry for Half-Orc in the races dataset.
half-orc.data.racialTraits.0.name: Orc Blood
half-orc.data.racialTraits.0.description: Half-orcs count as both orcs and humans for effects related to race.

halfling.name: Halfling
halfling.description: Detailed reference entry for Halfling in the races dataset.
halfling.data.racialTraits.0.name: Fearless
halfling.data.racialTraits.0.description: +2 racial bonus on all saving throws against fear.
halfling.data.racialTraits.1.name: Thrown Weapon Bonus
halfling.data.racialTraits.1.description: +1 racial bonus on attack rolls with thrown weapons and slings.
halfling.data.racialTraits.2.name: Surefooted
halfling.data.racialTraits.2.description: +2 racial bonus on Climb, Jump, and Move Silently checks.
